mapper.select: SELECT bs.id as id ,bs.spot_name as spot_name FROM biz_order bo LEFT JOIN biz_ticket bt on bo.ticket_id = bt.id LEFT JOIN biz_spot bs on bt.spot_id = bs.id WHERE bo.id = #{orderId};

SELECT *, (ifnull((SELECT min(price) FROM biz_ticket WHERE spot_id = biz_spot.id and biz_ticket.delete_flag = 'NOT_DELETE' ),0))as minPrice FROM biz_spot WHERE delete_flag = 'NOT_DELETE'
and spot_name like concat('%',#{spotName},'%')
order by rate desc
